episode_event_general_winter_2021/6701_1:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! It’s almost time for
the winter soiree!

I hope you’re excited! This year, we’ll make sure
everyone’s presents get delivered properly.

I’m known to lose myself in my work, but that
aside...Leon, haven’t you been overworking
yourself lately?

You do know that you could enjoy these events
every so often instead of helping out, right?

Nonsense! As long as there are people expecting
my appearance, it’s my job to be there for them!

I suppose so. But we haven’t had the chance to
hang out with Sonia lately, either...

Of course, part of that’s because she’s so busy
with all her research.
But...I’m just a little worried about that.
episode_event_general_winter_2021/6801_1:
This year, it’s our job to deliver
everyone’s presents!

I have to live up to my nickname, the unbeatable
Leon, and make sure everything is
delivered perfectly!
What kind of present would you like, Leon?

Hm... What I want the most is to see everyone
with champion smiles on their faces!
